region_description: Seychelles is an archipelago of 115 islands in the Indian Ocean, known for its stunning beaches, crystal-clear waters, and diverse marine life. The main islands, Mahe, Praslin, and La Digue, offer a blend of luxury, adventure, and relaxation. The unique granite boulders, lush tropical forests, and vibrant coral reefs make Seychelles a paradise for nature lovers and beach enthusiasts. Visitors can explore national parks, enjoy water sports, and indulge in delicious Creole cuisine, making it a top destination for a tropical getaway.

places_to_visit.name: Anse Source d'Argent
places_to_visit.description: Anse Source d'Argent is renowned for its picturesque beach, featuring unique granite boulders and soft white sand. It's one of the most photographed beaches in the world, perfect for relaxation and photography.

places_to_visit.name: Vallée de Mai Nature Reserve
places_to_visit.description: Vallée de Mai is a UNESCO World Heritage Site located on Praslin Island. It is home to the famous Coco de Mer palm and a diverse range of flora and fauna, making it a paradise for nature enthusiasts.

places_to_visit.name: Morne Seychellois National Park
places_to_visit.description: Morne Seychellois National Park is the largest national park in Seychelles, covering over 20% of Mahé Island. It features hiking trails, stunning views, and rich biodiversity, including unique bird species.

places_to_visit.name: Curieuse Island
places_to_visit.description: Curieuse Island is famous for its giant tortoises and beautiful beaches. Visitors can take guided tours to learn about the island's ecology and enjoy snorkeling in its clear waters.

hotels.name: Four Seasons Resort Seychelles
hotels.description: Four Seasons Resort Seychelles offers luxurious accommodations with stunning views of the Indian Ocean. The resort features a spa, gourmet dining, and access to beautiful beaches.

hotels.name: Constance Lemuria Seychelles
hotels.description: Constance Lemuria Seychelles is a luxury resort located on Praslin Island. It features elegant suites, three beaches, and a championship golf course, perfect for a relaxing getaway.

restaurants.name: Marie Antoinette Restaurant
restaurants.description: Marie Antoinette is a historic restaurant known for its Creole cuisine and seafood dishes. Set in a charming colonial house, it offers a unique dining experience.

restaurants.name: Delplace Restaurant
restaurants.description: Delplace Restaurant offers a beautiful view of the sea and serves a mix of Creole and international cuisine. It's a great spot for a romantic dinner.
